'''Radiant Spincrystal 120''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Jade Chimes]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a cliff in [[Chiwang Terrace]] in [[Chenyu Vale]], [[Liyue]].
